beers.description: Maitake Mushroom Mild. 4.7% Brewed with a plethora of specialty malts and Maitake Mushrooms that were foraged locally by Jean. Solely and thoughtfully hopped with UK 1st Gold. Fermented in stainless with our expressive house ale yeast. Conditioned on malted chocolate milk balls and Montmorency cherries.
beers.summary: Maitake Mushroom Mild. 4.7% Brewed with a plethora of specialty malts and Maitake Mushrooms that were foraged locally by Jean. Solely and thoughtfully hopped with UK 1st Gold. Fermented in stainless with our expressive house ale yeast. Conditioned on malted chocolate milk balls and Montmorency cherries.

beers.notes: Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.
beers.description: Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #23. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
beers.summary:
Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #23. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.

beers.notes: Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.
beers.description: Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
beers.summary:
Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.

beers.notes: Notes of vanilla flowers, orange zest, oyster crackers, and custard pie filling.
beers.description: Cream Ale. 5.4% Our Cream Ale brewed with flaked corn. Hopped thoughtfully in the kettle with Crystal. Fermented and lagered for many moons in stainless steel.
beers.summary:
Cream Ale. 5.4% Our Cream Ale brewed with flaked corn. Hopped thoughtfully in the kettle with Crystal. Fermented and lagered for many moons in stainless steel.
Notes of vanilla flowers, orange zest, oyster crackers, and custard pie filling.

beers.notes: Notes of chocolate covered raisins, cocoa, salted caramel, and cedar plank.
beers.description: Imperial Pretzel Stout. 9.0% Brewed with a plethora of specialty and roasted malts, local sourdough pretzels, sea salt, and goopy blackstrap molasses.. Hopped with a handful of UK 1st Gold. Fermented in stainless then conditioned on Cacao nibs.10% of the proceeds of this beer will be donated to Philabundance.
beers.summary:
Imperial Pretzel Stout. 9.0% Brewed with a plethora of specialty and roasted malts, local sourdough pretzels, sea salt, and goopy blackstrap molasses.. Hopped with a handful of UK 1st Gold. Fermented in stainless then conditioned on Cacao nibs.10% of the proceeds of this beer will be donated to Philabundance.
Notes of chocolate covered raisins, cocoa, salted caramel, and cedar plank.

beers.notes: Notes of Trocken Riesling, Crisp Granny Smith apple, underripe stone fruit, and dried cherries.
beers.description: Blended Saison. 4.5% A Blended Saison made of two parts: A magickal saison fermented and aged in Chardonnay barrels with our magickal saison yeast. Second, a Smoked Peach Saison fermented entirely in stainless atop in-house applewood smoked peaches from our pal Ben Wenk at Three Springs Fruit Farm.
beers.summary:
Blended Saison. 4.5% A Blended Saison made of two parts: A magickal saison fermented and aged in Chardonnay barrels with our magickal saison yeast. Second, a Smoked Peach Saison fermented entirely in stainless atop in-house applewood smoked peaches from our pal Ben Wenk at Three Springs Fruit Farm.
Notes of Trocken Riesling, Crisp Granny Smith apple, underripe stone fruit, and dried cherries.

beers.notes: Notes of never-ending weed fields, key lime custard, grilled pineapple and orange blossom honey.
beers.description: Single Hopped Double IPA. 8.0% Brewed with red wheat. Solely hopped in the kettle with a new to us hop, Eureka! Fermented in stainless with our expressive house ale yeast. Dry Hopped with an embarrassing amount of even more Eureka!
beers.summary:
Single Hopped Double IPA. 8.0% Brewed with red wheat. Solely hopped in the kettle with a new to us hop, Eureka! Fermented in stainless with our expressive house ale yeast. Dry Hopped with an embarrassing amount of even more Eureka!
Notes of never-ending weed fields, key lime custard, grilled pineapple and orange blossom honey.

beers.notes: otes of tart cherry pie filling, fresh cut hay, meyer lemon flesh, and black tea leaf.
beers.description: Local Cherry Biere de Garde. 5.3% Brewed with pilsner malt and Belgian pale malt. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with French Strisselspalt and boiled for many hours. Fermented in an open top stainless tank with our magickal saison yeast and microflora from second use local tart and sweet cherries from our pal Ben Wenk at Three Springs Fruit Farm.
beers.summary:
Local Cherry Biere de Garde. 5.3% Brewed with pilsner malt and Belgian pale malt. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with French Strisselspalt and boiled for many hours. Fermented in an open top stainless tank with our magickal saison yeast and microflora from second use local tart and sweet cherries from our pal Ben Wenk at Three Springs Fruit Farm.
otes of tart cherry pie filling, fresh cut hay, meyer lemon flesh, and black tea leaf.

beers.notes: Notes of coconut macaroon, fall baking spices, cranberry honey, and brisk ocean breeze.
beers.description: Lobster Chamomile Lager. 4.2% Brewed entirely with German pilsner malt and whole Maine lobsters. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with French Strisselspalt and Chamomile flowers. Fermented and lagered in stainless for many moons. Gently dry hopped with more Strisselspalt and a touch of Czech Kazbek.
beers.summary:
Lobster Chamomile Lager. 4.2% Brewed entirely with German pilsner malt and whole Maine lobsters. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with French Strisselspalt and Chamomile flowers. Fermented and lagered in stainless for many moons. Gently dry hopped with more Strisselspalt and a touch of Czech Kazbek.
Notes of coconut macaroon, fall baking spices, cranberry honey, and brisk ocean breeze.
